1.content:
The cool night air pickles against your nude body, an unlit pink candel hung in one hand. Looking down at your slightly muscular frame you see that despite yourself, you are starting to harden. You're standing in the center of an intricate circle in the middle of a forrest of your hosts property, fires positioned at even intervals around you. Waiting, you think back to how you would up hear.

*****

I was in the final quarter of my shift at my crappy retail job, ok it wasn't so bad as far as retail jobs go, but I didn't burry myself in debt earning a Master's degree to make little more then minimum wage helping morons find something right infront of their faces (ok, I'm more bitter then I realized.) Anyway I was in the home stretch before work ended when a well dressed man in a suit came up to me, now there where well dressed people who came in but this man was a world apart. He handed me his business card showing his name to be Mr. A. Devins assistant to one Bridgette F.M.P Berger. Now I knew this name, not many people didn't, she's practically owns everything in 100 square miles.

"Miss Berger has a proposition for you Mr. Morris. On the back of the business card I handed you is a QR code that will provide you with information. Please be discreet about this."

Nodding, I pocket the card and ask "how do you know my name?"

"You weren't chosen at random." He said as he turned around and left.

With that I spent the rest of my shift imaging what this could be. When I clocked out, I put in my headphones, scanned the card and waited for it to load. I was Yemen to a note.

"Dear Matthew Morris,

You have been selected for a ceremony of a supernatural persuasion. For participating you will be rewarded handsomely. For more information I must ask you for your silence, attached is a non disclosure agreement."

Clicking the link, I skimmed the document which mentioned harsh financial penalties for breaking it. Nervously I signed it. I was taken back to the first page with had additional text revealed.

"Thank you, as payment for your scilence and proof of my identity $12,000 has been added to your bank account"

I try to minimize the app to check my bank balance but it doesn't let me.

"Onto buisness, I have always wanted to be a man and my studdy of the occult has lead me to a way to make it happen. You have been chosen as my ideal candidate being financially desperate enough and having the same birthday among other reasons. If you agree to this you will become compleatly female, and will be provided with necessary documents for your new life as well as $10,000,000 after taxes. If you accept transportation will be provided Saturday night at a quarter past 11, you will be lead to a specific point on my property where you must strip, take what is given to you and do what your told."

*****

Matthew stood waiting, a beutiful woman came out wearing nothing carrying a blue candel in one hand and a knife. She walked up to me in the circle and started chanting in a language I didn't recognise. After about 5 minutes she motiend for me to hold up my free hand and cut it pouring blood on her blue candle which lit, then she had me do the same to her, her blood lighting my pink candle. They both melted incredibly fast though equally, generating a massive amount of smoke.
1.title: This mans price

12.content:
As the smoke cleared you see a man standing where the woman (presumably Bridgette Burger) had been, to your surprise you find him handsome. Tearing your eyes away from his endowments, you look down to see breasts, and beyond that a bush of hair where your own endowments once stood.

"It worked! This is amazing" he says hugging you, to which you just blush.

"So what now?" You say trying to ignore the penis pressing up against your nude body.

"Well first we celebrate, then Devins will go over the story with you. Unfortunately as great as this spell is, people still remember you as a man and me a woman."

"If they remember me as a man how will I explain this?"

"Simple, Devins has created documents for your gender transition, he already forged internet history to that effect."

"How am i?" You started before being interupted.

"One of the reasons we chose you was you aren't that connected. You don't have any friends in town, your coworkers don't know a single piece of personal info about you. And you won't need to work with the $10million. You haven't talked to your family in 3 years, and only communicated with your few friends through typing."

"Ok, how do you want to celebrate?" You ask.

Bridgette smiles and says

14.content:
The smoke clears and Matthew is able to see a figure through the smoke. A handsome man is standing nude across from him. Looking down he sees he can hardly be described as a he anymore, looking down past her breasts she sees curves and a flat area at her crotch.

"This is amazing" the man who's presumably Bridgette Burger says examining himself. "Guards" he calls and 3 men come out from behind the trees, two restrain Matthew and the third provides Bridgette with a bathrobe.

"Wa.. What?" She asks limited air able to escape.

"Now babe" he says flippantly "I can't have someone around who knows about this, and I know the plan was to pay you off but it would be cheaper to stick you with a new identity somewhere far away. That way if you try to tell anyone, they'll just think your crazy. But I am feeling generous so I had Devins move the money from your bank account into one for your new identity. As far as anyone will know, you skipped town."

"Bu but" Matthew said terrified.

"Take her away" Bridgette said and the two men restraining Matthew started to walk off. From a distance Bridgette added "Oh and knock her out." So they did, when Matthew next awoke he was in her new life. But as who?
14.title: Betrayed, you're dumped into a new identity

I look around the room, there's the bed against the wall a single night table a hamper and a vanity, heading to the closet i find nothing but cloths that show off my new femininity. 1413.content:
There's a small kitchen/dining/living area outside the bedroom. I'm shocked to find it furnishes with my old furniture, the plates are mine, even the food in the fridge. On the counter I find a manilla envelope and inside I find a driver's license, social security card, birth certificate, among other necessary documents, also included is a note.

"Dear Mr. Morris Miss Alexa Cummings
I must sincearly apologise, I cannot disobey my boss on a direct order or I risk my life. As such I have provided you with the best identity I was able to. You are an exotic dancer at a fairly high end establishment, you will find when the time comes you will know what to do. I have also endeavored to make your new appartment as homey as possible by moving all your belongings sans clothing. I also provided you with a new cell phone, that has my number loaded, do not call only text me and only invade of emergency.

Sincearly
Arthur Devins"
1413.title: A note

You find that your shirt has changed to a nice blouse of the same color and material, while your pants are now a knee-length tan skirt. Where your shoes were are now a pair of nice heels. "Those are still your clothes, they've just been feminized. With a spell like this, you've got three outcomes. Either your reality resists the change, and you end up a tomboy, your reality accepts the change, and your life becomes the female version of it, or it embraces the change, in which case you learn what it really would have been like had you been born a girl."

info.brief_description: Guy agrees to become a woman for alot of money
info.description:
Our hero is Matthew Morris, a man burried in debt who sells his masculinity for a nice sum of money.

Beyond that setup and some prompts do whatever you wish with it.
